content:
Korey is organizing a music concert. She plans to invest $\$2000$ to rent the venue and to pay the musicians and then sell the tickets for $\$20$ each. Graph $A$ below shows the profit $y$ she will make from the concert as a function of the number of tickets sold $x$.

**Create a graph to show Korey's profit if she decides to invest only $\$1200$ to rent the venue and pay the musicians.**

[[â˜ƒ interactive-graph 1]]
